attributes.action: Scrap the tax charge on private healthcare provided by employers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment private healthcare provided by employers is a taxable benefit in kind (BIK) payable at the full marginal rate of tax. If we made it free, this would encourage more people to consider taking up private healthcare, freeing up NHS resources to treat the most needy in society.
